title: 1 hr 45 min power cut today
content:
The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka has granted approval for Ceylon Electricity Board to impose power cuts today.
“One hour power cut between 2:30pm-6:30pm and a 45 minute power cut between 6:30pm-10:30pm under 4 categories” PUCSL chairman announced.
“CEB don’t have enough fuel to run generators so we are compelled to cut power today” he added.
